label: Description
value: Orange ground, faded from red, with a repeat of flowers arranged in a cone shape with a perching bird on the stem. Brocaded in blue, green, white, and grey with gold metallic thread. Alternate rows turning left and right.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic thread Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft

label: Description
value: Fragmentary band with red roundels and guard borders in a pointed scroll pattern. Roundels contain animals and a crude winged angel. Triangular shapes fill spaces between roundels and guard borders, and these have geometrical palmettes.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: wool, linen Technique: tapestry weave

label: Description
value: Fragment with a tan ground, originally orange, with a single stiffly symmetrical stylized floral group with a palmette in an urn.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic thread Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft

label: Description
value: Narrow band fragment in dark brown and natural linen shows a procession of animals moving left to right. The animals, which alternate between a long-bodied spotted animal and a more compact animal with long ears and a tail, are enclosed by a double guard border. Outside this border is a scrolling wave pattern.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: S-spun undyed linen weft, S-spun undyed wool warp and weft Technique: slit tapestry weave

label: Description
value: Grayish-tan plain cloth with stamped diagonal lines in relief. Rows of Arabic characters painted over entire surface. Two seams.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen, pigment Technique: plain weave, painted and stamped

label: Description
value: Rectangular fragment from a garment or hanging. Wide decorated vertical areas on the right and left are connected by broad decorated transverse band. Linear black intersecting arcs form the outer border. On sides, black roundels and intricately constructed linear frames rise from plant motifs. Linear frames alternately enclose plant forms, birds, confronted birds and animals, some in the direction of the warp, some at right angles to it. Plant motifs tend to form linear and sometimes pointed trefoils. In transerve band at the bottom, similar plant forms support peacocks in a row. Just above, with a dark frame, two addorsed pairs of horned animals are within black squares framed with a pearl-like band. Above, interlocking spirals worked in soumak. Embroidery in two long vertical bands at sides. Soumak used for outlines of some motifs.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: S-spun undyed linen warp, S-spun undyed wool and S-spun black wool weft Technique: slit and dovetail tapestry weave with soumak and embroidered details

label: Description
value: Cap with a tan linen foundation. Blue silk and linen plain cloth covering quilted to the linen. One line of gold over top of crown. Stripe of gold placed vertically on band of cap. Rosette and quatrefoil embroidered with linen eyelet centers and gold outline.

label: Description
value: Sash fragment divided into narrow horizontal stripes. Stripes are alternately gold with blue geometric and linear pattern and green with pink and gold stylized flower and leaf pattern. One edge buttonholed, and the top is bound with magenta taffeta.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic thread Technique: plain compound weave

label: Description
value: Magenta satin ground with horizontal rows of a floral cone with a bird perching on the stem. Motif alternately turns left and right and is brocaded in blue, green, white, taupe and gold metallic thread.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic thread Technique: plain satin weave with supplementary weft

label: Description
value: Tan fragment with two cone-shaped floral forms perched over leafy stems. Brocaded in white, green and black.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft

label: Description
value: Cream-colored groud with a horizontal repeat of a three-domed mosque above a courtyard with a pool and potted flowers. Brocaded in green, blue, yellow, orange, and pink with silver and gold metallic thread.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic thread Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft

label: Description
value: Portrait of George Washington after a painting by Gilbert Stuart. Woven in black, gray and beige on a white ground. Facsimile of a signature "G Washington" woven at the bottom.

label: Description
value: Still life with lute, violins, books and sheet music on a table covered with a red tablecloth.

label: Description
value: Triangular piece of reticella with a central human figure with tiny black glass beads for eyes.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen, black glass beads for eyes Technique: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style

label: Description
value: Large flowers in bright colors on a ground of pin-dots. Printed in brown, blue, yellow and red.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed by block and engraved roller on plain weave, glazed

label: Description
value: Rocaille framing with various games and other objects in upper section; in lower section, announcement for Levasseu, beginning: "LEVASSEUR Md. Tabletier, Fait et vend toutes / sortes d'Ouvrages de Tabletterie"; etc., etc. "A Paris" is written in an escutcheon in the bottom center of the frame; signature beside it: "brichet Del. Sculp."
